pr_title: Copy headers from original response when returning not modified.

timeline.bodyText: I think set(..) will override the header for multi value headers and add should be used instead
timeline.author: graemerocher

timeline.message:
Copy headers from original response when returning not modified.

Otherwise headers added by filters are lost.

Copy headers from original response when returning not modified.

Otherwise headers added by filters are lost.

Only copy non http entity headers

when returning NOT_MODIFIED.
